help:
ryouko [-h|--help] [-pb|--pb] [URLs]

-h or --help: This help screen
-pb or --pb: Opens [URLs] in private browsing mode
newSearchError: Search expression must contain %s to indicate where the search terms go!
historyError: Oh, no! An error has occurred while trying to access or modify the history! Ryouko is now going to clear the history in an attempt to fix this. =(
newTabShortcuts:
Keyboard shortcuts
F1: Show this new tab page
Ctrl+N: New window*
Ctrl+W: Close window
Alt+Left: Go back
Alt+Right: Go forward
Ctrl+R; F5: Reload
Esc: Stop
Ctrl+L; Alt+D: Open URL
Ctrl+F: Find text
Ctrl+G; F3: Find next
Ctrl+=; Ctrl++: Zoom in
Ctrl+-: Zoom out
Ctrl+0: Reset zoom

Mouse over the different buttons for more keyboard shortcuts!* Opens a new tab by default; to change this, open the Preferences dialog and uncheck 'Open new windows as tabs'
loginToDownload: &Login to download? [does not work in axel]
clearCookiesMsg: Cookies will be cleared on browser restart.
clearTempFilesMsg: Temporary files will be cleared on browser restart.
searchError: Ryouko encountered an error while trying to modify the search.
